00026 #include "LPC17xx.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_clkpwr.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00029 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"
00030 #include "lpc17xx_wdt.h"

00032 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00038 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00039 uint8_t menu[]=
00040         "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00041         "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00042         "Power control demo \n\r"
00043         "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00044         "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00045         "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00046         "This example used to enter system in deep sleep mode and wake up it by using \n\r "
00047         "Watchdog timer interrupt \n\r"
00048         "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00049 //Watchodog time out in 2 seconds
00050 #define WDT_TIMEOUT     2000000
00051 
00052 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00053 void print_menu(void);
00054 void WDT_IRQHandler(void);
00055 
00056 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00057 void WDT_IRQHandler(void)
00058 {
00059         // Disable WDT interrupt
00060         NVIC_DisableIRQ(WDT_IRQn);
00061         WDT_ClrTimeOutFlag();
00062 }
00063 
00064 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00065 /*********************************************************************/
00070 void print_menu(void)
00071 {
00072         _DBG(menu);
00073 }
00074 
00075 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00076 /*********************************************************************/
00081 int c_entry (void)
00082 {
00083         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00084          * – 115200bps
00085          * – 8 data bit
00086          * – No parity
00087          * – 1 stop bit
00088          * – No flow control
00089          */
00090         debug_frmwrk_init();
00091 
00092         // print welcome screen
00093         print_menu();
00094 
00095         // Init WDT, IRC OSC, interrupt mode, timeout = 2000000 us = 2s
00096         WDT_Init(WDT_CLKSRC_IRC, WDT_MODE_INT_ONLY);
00097 
00098         _DBG_("Press '1' to enter system in Deep Sleep mode");
00099         while(_DG !='1');
00100 
00101         NVIC_EnableIRQ(WDT_IRQn);
00102         WDT_Start(WDT_TIMEOUT);
00103 
00104         _DBG_("Enter Deep Sleep mode!");
00105         _DBG_("Wait 2s for WDT wake-up system...");
00106 
00107         /*---------- Disable and disconnect the main PLL0 before enter into Deep-Sleep
00108          * or Power-Down mode <according to errata.lpc1768-16.March.2010> ------------
00109          */
00110         LPC_SC->PLL0CON &= ~(1<<1); /* Disconnect the main PLL (PLL0) */
00111         LPC_SC->PLL0FEED = 0xAA; /* Feed */
00112         LPC_SC->PLL0FEED = 0x55; /* Feed */
00113         while ((LPC_SC->PLL0STAT & (1<<25)) != 0x00); /* Wait for main PLL (PLL0) to disconnect */
00114         LPC_SC->PLL0CON &= ~(1<<0); /* Turn off the main PLL (PLL0) */
00115         LPC_SC->PLL0FEED = 0xAA; /* Feed */
00116         LPC_SC->PLL0FEED = 0x55; /* Feed */
00117         while ((LPC_SC->PLL0STAT & (1<<24)) != 0x00); /* Wait for main PLL (PLL0) to shut down */
00118         /*------------Then enter into PowerDown mode ----------------------------------*/
00119 
00120         // Enter target power down mode
00121         CLKPWR_DeepSleep();
00122         SystemInit();
00123         debug_frmwrk_init();
00124         _DBG_("\n\rSystem wake-up!\n\r");
00125         while(1);
00126         return 1;
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00131    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00132    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00133    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00134    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00135 int main(void)
00136 {
00137     return c_entry();
00138 }

00149 {
00150         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00151          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */

00155 }
